PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="VSS Checkout"><properties><entry name="text">VSS Checkout</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_VSS_UTIL_DIRs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="SS Utility Directory" tooltip="Path to the directory containing ss.exe utility which will be used to communicate with Visual SourceSafe database.
